resources.string: Alukho uhlelo lokusebenza olutholakele lokuvula leli fayela
Ukususa izinto ezingezansi kuzozisusa unomphela kudivayisi yakho futhi azikwazi ukutholwa.
Ingabe ufuna ukusetha indlela yamanje njengekhaya le le thebhu?
Isetha umbala wesithonjana esimile. Ayikhiphi okuthandwayo kombala wesithonjana sohla lwemibhalo.
Okwedivayisi enezimpande kuphela. Kuhlole kuphela uma uqinisekile ngakho.
Izinguquko zizokwenzeka ngemva kokuba uqale kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza
Bonisa usayizi wamafayela nenani lezinto kumafolda
Unezinguquko ezingalondoloziwe, ingabe ufuna ukuzilondoloza ngaphambi kokuphuma?
Lena ingobo yomlando. Isiphi isenzo ongathanda ukusenza?
Lesi isifaki sephakheji. Isiphi isenzo ongathanda ukusenza?
Sebenzisa izithonjana eziyindilinga ukuze uthole izithombe namavidiyo
Inika amandla ukuzulazula emuva ngokwezifiso phezulu kohlu
Lolu uhlelo lokusebenza lwesistimu, ukulisusa kungase kuholele ekungazinzini kwesistimu.\nQhubeka?
Amafayela angobo yomlando azokhishelwa kule folda. Inani elizenzakalelayo uhla lwemibhalo okulondolozwe kulo ingobo yomlando.
Lapho uqalisa, ifolda esanda kubukwa yethebhu ngayinye izoboniswa
Ukuthi ibha yokuzulazula yesistimu ifakwe umbala ngesikhumba noma cha
Setha umbala kuzinto ezinkulu ze-UI kuthebhu engakwesokunxele
Setha umbala ku-FAB nenye i-UI encane izici
Uhlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume yesitoreji ukuze luqhubeke . Ukukhansela le ngxoxo kuzophuma ohlelweni lokusebenza.
Sesha usebenzisa inkulumo evamile yesitayela se-BASH
Uma kusethiwe, izengezo ezijwayelekile zizofaniswa nalo lonke igama lefayela, izobheka ukwenzeka ngenye indlela.
Setha umbala ezintweni ezinkulu ze-UI kuthebhu elungile
Bika iziphazamisi noma ucele isici esisha

Ungafinyelela kanjani ifolda ye-Windows eyabelwe ku-Android (SMB)


Nika amandla ukwabelana kwefayela ku-Windows

Vula Iphaneli Yokulawula, chofoza Khetha Iqembu Lasekhaya kanye nezinketho Zokwabelana ngaphansi Kwenethiwekhi ne-Inthanethi, bese uchofoza okuthi "Shintsha Izilungiselelo Zokwabelana Ezithuthukile," nika amandla "Ifayela kanye Isici Sokwabelana Ngephrinta".


Izilungiselelo ezengeziwe Zokwabelana Ngefayela

Ungase futhi ufune ukumisa ezinye izilungiselelo zokwabelana ezithuthukile lapha. 
 Isibonelo, ungavumela ukufinyelela kumafayela akho ngaphandle kwephasiwedi uma uwethemba wonke amadivayisi kunethiwekhi yakho yasendaweni. Uma ifayela nephrinta ukwabelana sekunikwe amandla, ungakwazi vula i-File Explorer noma i-Windows Explorer, chofoza kwesokudla ifolda ofuna ukwabelana ngayo, futhi khetha Izakhiwo. 
 Chofoza inkinobho ethi Yabelana futhi wenze ifolda itholakale kunethiwekhi.


Qiniseka ukuthi womabili amadivayisi aku-Wifi eyodwa

Lesi sici senza amafayela atholakale kunethiwekhi yendawo, ukuze i-PC yakho namadivayisi eselula kufanele ibe kunethiwekhi yendawo efanayo. Awukwazi ukufinyelela ifolda ye-Windows eyabelwe nge-inthanethi noma uma i-smartphone yakho ixhunywe kudatha yayo yeselula — it kufanele ixhumeke ku-Wi-Fi.


Thola Ikheli Le-IP

Vula i-Command Prompt. Thayipha okuthi 'ipconfig' bese ucindezela u-Enter. Bheka Isango Elizenzakalelayo ngaphansi kwe-adaptha yakho yenethiwekhi yekheli le-IP lerutha yakho. Funa i \"IPv4 Ikheli\" ngaphansi kwengxenye ye-adaptha efanayo ukuze uthole i-IP yekhompyutha yakho ikheli.


Faka imininingwane ebhokisini lengxoxo le-SMB
Uzodinga ukukopishela leli fayela endaweni yokugcina ukuze ulivule
Indlela kumsuka wohla lwemibhalo ozokwabelana ngalo
Fihla ngokuzenzakalela ibha yamathuluzi ngenkathi uskrola
Setha iphasiwedi eyinhloko yokubethela. Shiya kungenalutho ukuze ususwe.
Sebenzisa izigxivizo zeminwe ukuze uqinisekise ukubethela
Yaziswa, lapho ushintsha iphethini yakho yokuvikela kusuka Izilungiselelo zesistimu, ngeke ukwazi ukususa ukubethela lokhu okuqukethwe.
I-plugin ye-Amaze Cloud ayitholakali. Sicela ulande ku-Google Play Isitolo.
Yehlulekile ukulayisha uxhumano. Sicela uvule i-Amaze Cloud kanye.
Iphelelwa inkumbulo, sicela usule enye i-RAM
Ithokheni elahlekile, sicela ungene ngemvume futhi
Ibha yendlela yokucindezela isikhathi eside ukuze uthayiphe indlela yangokwezifiso
Ikuvumela ukuthi uvule amafayela emisebenzini ehlukene. Zifinyelele kusukela kusikrini sakamuva sesistimu.
Sicela ufake uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Bitcoin Wallet
Yehlulekile ukulayisha amafayela. Sicela uhlole uxhumo lwakho.

Ubuqiniso bosokhaya '%1$s' abukwazi ukusungulwa.

%2$s izigxivizo zeminwe zokhiye ngu-%3$s.

Sicela uthephe okuthi "Yebo" ukuze uqinisekise ubunikazi; uma kungenjalo, sicela uthephe okuthi "Cha".
Ukwehluleka kwelogo: Ayikwazi ukuqinisekisa ngegama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi enikeziwe.
Ukwehluleka kwelogo: Ayikwazi ukugunyaza ngegama lomsebenzisi elinikeziwe nokhiye oyimfihlo.

KUKWENZEKA UKUTHI UMUNTU WENZA OKUTHILE!

Kungenzeka ukuthi kukhona ongakulalela. njengamanje (ukuhlasela kwendoda ephakathi)! Kungenzeka futhi ukuthi ukhiye womsingathi usanda kushintshwa. Izigxivizo zeminwe zokhiye osesidlangalaleni othunyelwe umsingathi wesilawulikude azifani nalesi esigcinwe ku-Amaze.

Sicela uxhumane nomlawuli wesistimu yakho noma usethe uxhumo olusha ukuze uqhubeke uxhumeke kuseva.
Ayikho idekhoda evumelekile yokususa ukubethela kwe-PEM.
Ayikwazi, sicela uvule kabusha kuhlelo lokusebenza lokugcina
I ifayela lide kakhulu futhi alikwazi ukuhlelwa, nokho ungafunda izinhlamvu zokuqala ezingu-%d

I-AESCrypt ifomethi yomthombo ovulekile yokubethela ifayela esekelwe ekubetheleni kwe-AES. Futhi iyaphatheka, ingasuswa ukubethela ngezinhlelo ze-AESCrypt kwezinye izinkundla.

Iwebhusayithi ye-AESCrypt

Ifomethi Yokubhala Ye-Amaze nayo isekelwe ekubetheleni kwe-AES; kodwa ihlukile kufomethi ye-AESCrypt, ingasuswa kuphela ukubethela ngale divayisi; futhi akumele ukhiphe i-Amaze File Manager kule divayisi noma ushintshe indlela ovala ngayo isikrini, ngaphandle kwalokho ngeke ube nayo indlela yokuphinda uthole ifayela elibethelwe.
Amafayela abethelwe kufanele asebenzise \".aze\" njengesandiso sefayela.
Amafayela abethelwe kufanele asebenzise \".aes\" njengesandiso sefayela.
Uhlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume ukuze lufake izinhlelo zokusebenza.
Amanye amafayela kungobo yomlando awakwazi ukukhishwa; ingobo yomlando ingase yonakaliswe noma ivele emthonjeni ongalungile.
Manje uzoya kusistimu yefayela ye-Android ngenxa yezizathu zokuphepha. Sicela ukhethe idivayisi ye-USB ohlwini olungakwesokunxele.
Nika amandla umphumela we-marquee wamagama wefayela
Ayikwazi vula ingobo yomlando \"%s\". Asikwazi ukuvula ingobo yomlando, noma ingobo yomlando yonakalisiwe.

KUKWENZEKA UKUTHI UMUNTU WENZA OKUHLUPHEKA!

Kungenzeka ukuthi othile ukulalele khona manje (ukuhlasela kwendoda emaphakathi)! Kungenzeka futhi ukuthi ukhiye womsingathi usanda kushintshwa. Izigxivizo zeminwe ngoba ukhiye osesidlangalaleni othunyelwe umsingathi wesilawuli kude awufani nalowo ogcinwe ku-Amaze.

Ungaqhubeka nokubuyekeza izigxivizo zeminwe zomsingathi noma ukhansele ukubuyekeza izilungiselelo zokuxhuma kwe-SSH.
Amanye amafayela ahlulekile ngenxa yokusebenza okungavumelekile
Xhuma kunethiwekhi noma unike amandla i-AP
Sicela uhlole ukuthi ingabe inkinga edingida ukuphahlazeka kwakho isikhona yini kakade.
Khubaza ukuhlola kokusayina kwe-IPC (Kumaseva wefa we-SMBv1 - AKUPHEPHILE!)
Isula izinhlelo zokusebenza ezikhethiwe zokuvula ifayela ezizenzakalelayo
Uma inikwe amandla, isebenzisa indlela yefa ukuze kuhlu lwamafayela
ingobo yomlando ye-RAR \"%s\" iyingobo yomlando ye-RAR v5 engasekelwe.
Uzodinga ukuqala kabusha iseva ye-FTP ukuze izinguquko zisebenze.
Ayikwazi ukukhipha okufakiwe okungobo yomlando \"%s\" kuya ku-\"%s\".
Thinta futhi uhudule ukuze uhambise noma ukopishe amafayela
Thinta futhi uhudule ukuze ukhethe amafayela

Njengoba lokhu kuwukusebenzisa kwakho kokuqala kweseva ye-FTP, futhi usebenzisa isitoreji sangaphakathi sedivayisi njengefolda eyabelwe, sicela uvumele i-Amaze ukuthi ifinyelele isitoreji isebenzisa i-SAF.\n\n
Udinga ukwenza lokhu kanye kuphela, kuze kube yisikhathi esilandelayo lapho ukhetha indawo entsha ozokwabelana ngayo.

Njengoba i-Android 10, i-Android yayibeke imikhawulo kuzinhla zemibhalo ezithile, futhi idinga ukufinyelela ngohlaka Lokufinyelela Isitoreji.\n \nSicela uvumele i-Amaze ukuthi ifinyelele uhla lwemibhalo kumphathi wefayela wesistimu ngokuthepha okuthi \"Vumela Ukufinyelela\".
Nika amandla lokhu ukuze uthole usekelo lokusebenzisa isitoreji sangaphandle sedivayisi ezinguqulweni ezintsha ze-Android

Indlela eyabiwe yeseva ye-FTP isethwe kabusha kusitoreji sangaphakathi njengoba ushintshela ku- ukuqaliswa kwesistimu yefayela yefa. Sicela ukhethe indlela entsha usebenzisa imenyu engaphezulu kwesokudla njengoba kudingeka.
Indlela eyabelwe yeseva ye-FTP isethwe kabusha kusitoreji sangaphakathi
Ukhetha indlela edinga ukufinyelela kwezimpande. Sicela unike amandla i-root explorer kuzilungiselelo uma idivayisi yakho izimpande.

Ukhetha indlela edinga ukufinyelela kwezimpande, evumela ukusebenza kokufunda/ukubhala kulo lonke uhlelo lwefayela kudivayisi yakho, futhi iyingozi - amaphutha anganaki isitini idivayisi yakho!\n\nUqinisekile?
Ifayela alikwazanga kuvulwe kusetshenziswa lolu hlelo lokusebenza
Dala uxhumano lwe-Google Drayivu™ ukuze uphathe amafayela ngaphakathi kwe-Amaze File Manager.
Iphutha ukulanda uhlu lomkhiqizo kusuka I-Google Play.

Njengoba ku-Android 11, i-Google icela Abaphathi Befayela ukuthi bacele imvume yomsebenzisi yokuphatha wonke amafayela kudivayisi. Imininingwane lapha. 

Isiphathi Sefayela se-Amaze sidinga le mvume nayo. Ngemva kokucindezela okuthi "Nikeza"lapha, sicela ukhethe okuthi Vumela ukufinyelela ukuze ulawule wonke amafayela esikrinini esilandelayo. 

Ukukhansela le ngxoxo kuzophuma ohlelweni lokusebenza.
Yenza ngendlela oyifisayo itimu, imibala nokubukeka komphathi wefayela
Lawula ukuthi yiluphi ulwazi oluzoboniswa, yenza ngendlela oyifisayo ibha eseceleni, futhi uguqule okuncamelayo kwe-UI
Shintsha ukuziphatha okufana nokusesha okuthuthukisiwe nokuthi uyawavula yini amafayela njengomsebenzi omusha

Uqondiswa kabusha ku-Amaze File Utilities. Iwuhlelo lwethu lokusebenza lomthombo ovulekile olunezibukeli zomsindo/ividiyo/isithombe/amadokhumenti, elikuvumela ukuthi uhlaziye amafayela angenalutho ukuze ukhulule isitoreji, udlulise ngokushesha usebenzisa i-Wifi P2P nokunye okwengeziwe.\nSicela usisekele ngokuzama.
Siyabonga ngokufaka i-Amaze File Utilities. Uqondiswa kabusha ohlelweni lokusebenza.
Ngokwegunya lenqubomgomo ye-Google Play, izinhlelo zokusebenza azivunyelwe ukuzibuyekeza ngokwazo. Sicela ubuyekeze uhlelo lokusebenza ku-Google Play.
Ayikwazi ukuthola ulwazi lwephakheji kufayela \"%s\". Kungenzeka ukuthi ifayela elishiwo aliyona i-APK, noma ifayela lephakheji lonakele.
Cela ukuqinisekiswa ngaphambi kokususa amafayela. Ukukhubaza lokhu akukhuthazwa kakhulu!
Ukukhipha kuhlulekile: ayikwazanga ukubhala ifayela eliyisipele
Ukungenisa kuhlulekile: ayikwazanga ukufunda isipele ifayela
I-Amaze Cloud Plugin ayisekelwe nge-F- Inguqulo ye-Droid. Sicela usebenzise inguqulo ye-Google Play Isitolo ye-Amaze.
Ikhubaza isidlali semidiya esakhelwe ngaphakathi se-Amaze kusikhethi sefayela
Alukho uhlelo lokusebenza olutholakele oluphatha le nhloso. Yenza unayo i-DocumentsUI efakiwe?
Ngeshwa, asikwazanga ukuthuthela izifakazelo zakho zokuxhumanisa ifu ku-schema sesizindalwazi esisha, futhi kudingeke ukuthi sizisuse ohlelweni lokusebenza. Sicela udale uxhumano lwamafu futhi.
